node.title: It's always sunny with OpenJ9!
node.speaker: Dan Heidinga
node.description: So you’ve been deploying Java in the cloud and are wondering how to handle the new world of containers, microservices, and memory constraints. Cold starts got you down? Come to this session to learn about how the OpenJ9 and the JVM in general can help you on your Cloud Native journey

node.title: OpenJDK panel
node.speaker: Dan Heidinga & others
node.description: Join the folks from all the major JDK distributions on this panel to hear about what’s happening with OpenJDK and on the JVM

node.html: This text should be the introduction of the most recent udpate about the product. We might also want to consider using tags or something as a way to draw additional attention to topics not introduced in the product update lead-in. Ultimately this should lead to a GitHub page.
